grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 弔辞【チョウジ】message of condolence, memorial address
慶弔【ケイチョウ】congratulations and condolences
kun reading compounds: 弔う【とむらう】to mourn for, to condole with (family, etc.), to hold a memorial service (for)
